entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 35. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
